a very clear statement on the challenges capitalism

all_paragraphs: Individuals and companies are expected to maintain a vision for three to five years in the future, a strategy to support a plan for reaching the goals which in the end will become the manifestation of their vision.

A person or company without a vision (small or large) is comparable to a ship without a rudder. The direction is determined by the changing weather conditions, and the only concern is how to survive the current storm or a windless day.

The election for the European Parliament was just carried out in 28 countries, covering more than 500 million people, AI and the 4th Industrial Revolution (4IR) was barely mentioned in the campaigns. Ignoring completely these two key players in most of the solutions to the topics actually covered.

We need to start concerning ourselves with the question of vision and goal for mankind, in particular in relation to our new and evolving magic wands AI and 4IR. Maybe it is unrealistic to aim at a single vision for the entire mankind. Still, we need the brainstorm, exchange of ideas, and debate about the future direction to stay in control and ensure that in ten, twenty or thirty years the reality will be favourable for a majority of the global population.

UN has defined the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG)which is a very good way to address the problems we face today. Still, none of the goals is directly related to guiding the AI/4IR in a specific direction with the best of our society in mind.
For decades the climate has been changing, scientists have been warning about it while others have been denying it. In the meantime, the climate changes got more severe by the minute.

With AI/4IR it is a similar situation, there are lots of disagreement of how fundamental and all-embracing the changes will be and how fast they will come. In the meantime, the development is accelerating and producing new result every day.

Today, the biggest AI race is the competition to develop the first Artificial General Intelligence(AGI). AGI is a human-like intelligence developed to solve general tasks, not just a single specific task. The first country or company to succeed will gain a tremendous advantage and as soon as it is working, it will spend 24 hours, 7 days a week to improve itself. The fact that there are literally being invested millions in AGI projects every day, proves how serious investors are taking this, and is a strong indication of how far the AI engineers already are.
Three topics that are regularly mentioned when attempting to predict a future AI/4IR world
· Jobs — How many will lose their jobs to robots and AI?
· Sharing of resources — Who will own the robots and the AI?

I honestly find it odd to discuss if AI and 4IR will result in loss of jobs. I assume that it is part of the entire concept. To produce solutions that can help people in their work or even do it for them. The presumption that AI/4IR does not reduce the size of the workforce, is not logical. Why develop a solution that renders one job redundant and then creates a new one another place? it is futile.

This is where I bring Aladdin and his lamp in. If you had the magic lamp in your hand and Genie appeared, would your first wish be “Please let me keep my job until my retirement”? I suppose not. Most people are looking for
· Security, food, good health, clothes, and shelter
· Influence/control over their own life
· Possibility to live out their potential
· And yes; Love and acceptance

What if AI and 4IR could provide at least the first two bullets for you. This would give you time and freedom to explore endless possibilities in the last two bullets, both alone and together with others. The vision is not laying on the couch all day developing a depression. It is about having enough resources to pursue the passions, that you never had time to really explore before. Imagine a world like that — It could become a reality in this century.

Of course, there is the obvious loss of income when jobs are reduced. This combined with millions of working people all over the world having a salary so low, that they can barely satisfy their basic needs, pose a growing problem for the global society already today.

Eric Weinstein, managing director of Thiel Capital, mathematician, and physicist is one of many how are worried about the state and capabilities of our current economic system. In his article “Anthropic Capitalism and the new gimmick economy”, he presents the thought experiment that capitalism could be a brief product of “happy coincidences confined in space and time to the developed world of the 19th– 20thcenturies.”. Being interviewed by Lex Fridman from MIT, he made a very clear statement on the challenges capitalismand society is facing.
I think hyper-capitalism is going to have to be coupled to hyper-socialism

Remember that capitalism was a result of the first industrial revolution beginning at the end of the 18thcentury. 4IR calls for major changes, maybe even a whole new system. This raises two questions; What should this new system be? And how can we safeguard a harmonious transition?
No matter when singularity and AGI will happen, conscious preparation for the transition is required now.
My wish to Genie would be:
“Please, make sure that everybody has enough, that the abundance is being fairly distributed, all humans are truly free, have access to education and healthcare, and nobody is being exploited”
Maybe capitalism can even provide this. I just think we owe it to ourselves to step-out-of-the-box and see if there are other options.
What is your wish? How would you like the society to be in 20 to 40 years from now? And how do you see mankind living with AI and the consequences of 4IR?
